com.facebook.react.touch

类 JSResponderHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.touch.JSResponderHandler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    OnInterceptTouchEventListener

    public class JSResponderHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements OnInterceptTouchEventListener
    This class coordinates JSResponder commands for UIManagerModule. It should be set as OnInterceptTouchEventListener for all newly created native views that implements ReactInterceptingViewGroup and thanks to the information whether JSResponder is set and to which view it will correctly coordinate the return values of OnInterceptTouchEventListener such that touch events will be dispatched to the view selected by JS gesture recognizer. Single CatalystInstance should reuse same instance of this class.

      • onInterceptTouchEvent

        public boolean onInterceptTouchEvent(android.view.ViewGroup v,
                                     android.view.MotionEvent event)
        从接口复制的说明: OnInterceptTouchEventListener
        Called when a onInterceptTouch is invoked on a view group
        指定者:
        onInterceptTouchEvent 在接口中 OnInterceptTouchEventListener
        参数:
        v - The view group the onInterceptTouch has been called on
        event - The motion event being dispatched down the hierarchy.
        返回:
        Return true to steal motion event from the children and have the dispatched to this view, or return false to allow motion event to be delivered to children view
